post.body: you're my hero again ;) launching internet in France, being grumpy, measuring quality, and fixing fotonauts :D perfect friend :)
@jmhullot can't launch as it quits in less than a sec. Fotonauts version 0.6 (build 12762) - running OSX 10.5.5
Fotonauts won't launch on my mac (osx 10.5) anymore... just quits... new feature ;) ?
starting a discussion thread on how to remove distortion on fisheyes lenses - interesting #photography http://fon.gs/fisheye
pas une analyse - juste qq comments qui me viennent à l'esprit en regardant tes chiffres ;)
some comments on your pres at #leweb08 and wikio financials http://tinyurl.com/58wvr8
is right - that was quote on the future by Woody Allen. It was printed on the wall of the media agency I went to this morning
it looks great, but should be filtered out on a tag as well ( http://tinyurl.com/62eqkf)
aha! Internet is back in my room fixed the wifi. updating appleTV+watching the Thomas Crown Affair 2.0 again on my big screen ;) g33K t1m3
just realized tonight that the Freebox v4 (a French ISP set top box) has tivo-like features : Pause live TV, fast-forward/skip-ads ... :D
uploaded 2nd batch of portraits from #leweb08 : http://www.flickr.com/photos/rsepulveda/
interviewed on VNUnet.fr at #leweb08 ; I shared some thoughts on hulu.com vs youtube. extra analysis here : http://fon.gs/hulu
oups Tweetwasters rank: #1265 - http://tweetwasters.com/rodrigo1971
just ordered a copy of @joi 's Freesouls book of internet portraits http://freesouls.cc/thebooks/
Michael Arrington To European startups : "get to work" - http://tinyurl.com/5hckz7
I have to say that @leafar has pure talent with photography. watch his work ! http://tinyurl.com/5jncos
joined the advisory board of the Next Conference 2009 in Hamburg in the spring http://fon.gs/next09
Ken Rockwell on the Canon 5D EOS Mark II : http://tinyurl.com/4vd6ha
About to teach a class on entrepreneurship at Telecom Paris (engineers) master degree + HEC B-school students
funny, I'm the 8th most subscribed to twitter user in France. Although stats done with 1034 followers, now 1333... (4th?) http://fon.gs/ts2
updates my 6 answers on entrepreneurship into a youtube playlist http://tinyurl.com/6dkh7g
sometimes what you wish for does come true ;) proof over here http://fon.gs/snow ♫ http://blip.fm/~18fyk
yuck ! just BLUE SKY for the next 2 days, tons of SNOW, pre-season still, hence almost NOBODY. what did I do right this time :D ?
Shitty weather report here ;) 1,60m of snow fell today & bright blue sky of stars now (hence blue sky tomorrow) - tough life...
ok switching transportation again in Cluses ;) now we're really up to the ski resort. Friday vote: drink / no drink later by the fireplace?
btw how cool is this ? listening to blip.fm on a 3G card while sitting in a bus driving thru French countryside under snow and web surfing!
snow everywhere down here in Bonneville - hurray! should be at least 1m tomorrow on the slopes up there ;)
Bellegarde. Getting closer to the top :)
on board train to the snow. watching the most extraordinary and glamorous russian diva, Anna Netrebko (great xmas idea: http://fon.gs/anna)
celebrating a happy color today ♫ http://blip.fm/~188ar
going offline for a few orange days - http://flickr.com/photos/rsepulveda/3120848120/
sth I want for Xmas : a mashup service that pulls the MP3s of the torrent according to a query on blip.fm (username, number of songs) > iPod
something is cookin' at Eyeka - VP sales left last month. Just got an email from the CEO leaving too. sign of the times ?
Apple's Software Update is just showing support for the canon EOS 5D MarkII for Aperture http://www.flickr.com/photos/rsepulveda/3118624917/
funny, I wrote this 3,5 years ago. http://tinyurl.com/3svscp Should follow my own advice :-S
3l1t3 g33k 4l3rt: testing 1080p HD cameras: www.RED.com gear vs canon EOS 5D markII - http://tinyurl.com/3hot6g
excited that Amiando is doing well, and is featured again on Techcrunch (http://fon.gs/amiando) - disclosure: I'm an early B-angel
Reading about Leroy Merlin's new ducotedechezvous.com in this week's Strategies (p. 26). Seems to me they are using a lot of video :D
getting fed up with total immersion in Excel, Powerpoint and Word today. Should be on firefox, spotify, aperture and xtorrent... instead
back to my dear old friend and foe, Excel...
Remembering I really know nothing about harmony theory (and I hated that Hanon exercise book) http://tinyurl.com/2x2pxm
Canon EOS 5D Mark II is available in Paris (the guy says supplies at least until Jan 15th) http://flickr.com/photos/rsepulveda/3163561259/
trying to figure out my next ski trip (well snowboard). What's your favorite resort ? (I prefer small traditional villages + lots of trees)
welcoming @tomraftery to blip.fm (http://blip.fm/invite/TomRaftery) :) great taste :)
engadget discussing improvements to the Canon EOS 5D Mark II: http://tinyurl.com/7gfzea
2009 wish 9 : #twitter adds a re-tweet (RT) shortcut to the right on the web UI (next to favorite and reply) #ev #wish2009
2009 wish 8 : apple upgrades the firmware for the AppleTV to support twitter on a large screen :) #wish2009
2009 wish 7 : apple upgrades the firmware for the AppleTV to support blip.fm #wish2009
2009 wish 6 : apple upgrades the firmware for the AppleTV to support more features on Flickr (eg. login to see private pix) #wish2009
Watching a DVD of Bartoli & Harnoncourt : the extras about the rehearsal work are remarkable to understand live opera performances
just because no one should care ;) : French Justice minister Rachida Dati gave birth today to a little girl: http://fon.gs/dati/ #people
lounging again with "Anoushka Shankar" on Spotify. Daniel Ek you rock! Sample: http://blip.fm/profile/rsepulveda/blip/2294051
just received 10 SMS for new year at the same time. Guess the Orange SMSC was clogged. good, it's only Jan 2nd @ 15:49... how many missing?
should get a new phone for 2009, since I've max out fidelity points with my operator (10,000 !) Suggestions ?
2009 wish 5 : DxO.com starts supporting my 85mm f/1.2 prime lens for both Canon 40D and Canon 5D Mark II #wish2009
My new year gift to you all: EOS 5D Mark II available in Paris for 2460€ http://fon.gs/cirque instead of 2899€ at FNAC http://fon.gs/fnac1 !
uploading a 130MB video to Facebook, dailymotion, vimeo & youtube at the same time is a bad idea... 2h30 hours to go still
is lounging on awdio.com
trying to figure out picture tagging in Flickr / Picasa / Facebook while reviewing pix from past 3y. Not yet perfect : http://fon.gs/pix/
2009 wish 4 : a better integration between albums on Flickr and Facebook (export from one to the other, like Fotonaut does) #wish2009
